headline: Pelmeni, Prepared Outside the Baths
abstract: Alison Roman takes Russian pelmeni, and turns them into a creamy, meaty-without-meat bowl.
lead_paragraph: A few years ago, I made the Russian baths a regular part of my New York life. The ritual of the shvitz — steaming, sweating and rinsing — is why I go (health!), but if I’m being honest, I also am very much there for the food (pleasure!).
